log: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch 'jedit'.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'jedit-4'.
Version number wound back to 3.2.2, removing .marks files
BeanShell performance fixes, removed Log statements from source files
New splash screen, other UI tweaks
Displays error message when classpath includes only jedit.jar.
More minor changes here and there
started new docking stuff, fixed build.xml
More docking work, fancy about box
Tweaks, more names in about box
Fixing window docking, better HTML stylesheet, various other changes
More dockable window improvements, context and tool bar option pane improved
Buffers use less memory, HyperSearch in selection, and other stuff too
folding rewrite started, explicit folding added
More folding work, and various other changes
Removed unnecessary Go to File System Browser macro
funky search and replace hack, more fold visibility manager stuff, a few tips updated
Collapse/expand fold reimplemented, rotated text drawn on Java 2
New document model started, refactoring buffer code, settings file backed up
More new document work, syntax debugging and tweaks

ignores *.class and jedit.jar (and himself?)
test the cvs informer
All line offset management is now done by offset manager
Faster file loading and minor tweaks
Fixed a number of content manager bugs and deadlocks
Core code no longer uses deprecated buffer APIs; more fold manager work
Auto indent fix, VFS file dialog fix, panel window container fix
New undo implementation; miscellaneous bug fixes
Checked for 4.0 API; added index data to source code
Modified for 4.0 API; added index data to source code
Checked for 4.0 API; added index data to source code
Modified for 4.0 API; added index data to source code; added buffer.isReadOnly() guard if buffer.insert() used
Conformed example macro and related discussion to change in macro source.
Checked for 4.0 API; added index data to source code
Modified for 4.0 API; added index data to source code
Modified for 4.0 API; added index data to source code
Checked for 4.0 API; added index data to source code
Checked for 4.0 API; added index data to source code
Checked for 4.0 API; added index data to source code
Modified for 4.0 API; added index data to source code
Delete reference to Show_Free_Memory.bsh (now in editor core)
MacOS plugin; new view/split view was broken
Fixed typo in name of macro in eval() call.
Bug fixes; new help viewer welcome screen; faster file loading; documentation updates
Updated for jEdit 4.0 API; annotated build.xml and user-guide.xsl with usage comments.
Updated for jEdit 4.0 API; annotated build.xml and user-guide.xsl with usage comments.
Updated for jEdit 4.0 API; annotated build.xml and user-guide.xsl with usage comments.
Further changes to conform to jEdit 4.0 plugin API.
Change to Hard tab/8 spaces at Slava's request
Documentation updates, minor abbrev usability tweaks
Revisions for jEdit 4.0 API; added index terms
Recent Directories menu, ~ can now be used in paths
New docking actions, mmb click is now treated like double-click in fs browser
More silly file system browser changes
'Favorites' menu in file system browser, input handler bug fix
Changes to installation macro set for jEdit 4.0pre2
Changes to installation macro set for jEdit 4.0pre2
Changes to installation macro set for jEdit 4.0pre2
Changes to installation macro set for jEdit 4.0pre2
narrowing re-implemented, fixing stupid position bug, minor tweaks throughout the code
bug fixes and option to disable 2-stage save
Correction re: jedit.exe command line usage
Some contributions from others: etter icons, backup on every save option
fixed typo in build.xml, and other tweaks

Documentation updates; incremental search for word/hypersearch for word
commands; bug fixes and tweaks
Some changes to multi file search and replace file
folding menu moved to top level of menu bar; next/prev/parent-fold actions
more search and replace refactoring; folding tweaks; prolly other stuff i forgot
Merged in a few contributions from others
Dropped 1.1/1.2 compatibility; removed .marks files that got imported accidentally
Cheesy overview page added to global opts, firewall plugin integrated into core (now that core depends on java 2)
Automatic detection of gzip and unicode files
PanelWindowContainer's rotated text icon now uses LineMetrics
GPL shown in installer; cleaning up sorting to be more inline with collections API; now use collections sorting in text area
More Java 1.4 workarounds; assorted bug fixes
More work on the new printing code
New printing code; Started soft wrap; neither works (yet)
chunk cache and various other changes
edit server changes; various bug fixes; mac os x workarounds
gutter converted to use chunk cache
Removed some internal offset manager wrapper methods from Buffer class; text area painter now uses chunk cache screen line code
Offset conversion API changes; chunk cache bug fixes and refactoring
soft wrap in the text area
some changes to line invalidation code
invalidation code bug fixes; text area mouse handler bug fixes; shift-dbl click in fs browser opens file in new view
ollie's patch; minor search and replace tweaks; text area bug fixes

install plugins dialog has new look; slightly faster temporary buffer loading;
a number of bug fixes; lots of miscellaneous stuff
Initial import of jEdit FAQ (DocBook XML format)
Adding additional Qand A's to FAQ
Adding additional Qand A's to FAQ
Adding additional Qand A's to FAQ
Adding additional Qand A's to FAQ
users guide and faq use a common stylesheet

soft wrap bug fixes; hard wrap re-introduced as a configurable option;
docs moved out of JAR
Corrections for inclusion of FAQ in jEdit 4.0pre4
FAQ document now using user's guide stylesheet
New jEdit icon, various bug fixes
more performance hacks, and bug fixes

trying to fix bug reported by ollie #2

replace dialog can be open per view, fixed lastPhysLine bug in text area,
smalltalk syntax highlighting

Performance improvements in scrolling, a few bug fixes, timing code in
JARClassLoader
minor bug fixes, dockable button tweaks, some other stuff
More bug fixes; Control-drag funkyness in text area; assorted tweaks
up/down arrows keys now soft-wrap-aware; scrolling bug fixes

ok it should work this time
Minor corrections and update for jEdit 4.0
Minor corrections and editorial changes for jEdit 4.0pre6
minor search dialog box and maybe some other stuff
Minor corrections; added question on out of memory errors
Minor corrections and editorial changes for jEdit 4.0pre6

Minor tweaks to build.xml; added build.properties and instructions for building
the source code; DocBook XSL stylesheet path no longer hardcoded
Modifications for jEdit 4.0 buffer and plugin API's
fixed showstopper in new file command

This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
'jedit-4-0-pre6'.
file loading optimization and a couple of bug fixes
Revert to non-modal dialog; add callls to buffer.begin/endCompoundEdit()
Don't load wheelmouse 0.5 on jdk 1.4; bug fixes
mike's tool bar patch, a few bug fixes
Mike's 'run last macro'/'run other macro' bug fix
some changes to regexp search code (still not perfect...); bug fixes
removed unnecessary beginCompoundEdit() from Toggle_Line_Comment macro
fixed notorious syntax highlighting/soft wrap bug
Line highlight now painted using an extension
(trying) to fix soft wrap scrolling bug
stylesheet hacks (from mike); minor bug fixes
Replace all in rect selection; fixed a few rect selection bugs; CS+click in text area didn't work
electric scroll reimplemented for soft wrap
failed saves no longer clear dirty flag; minor I/O error dialog box UI hack
Added missing clear.bsh; updated change log to mention BeanShell 1.2b41; changed default S+BACK_SPACE/DELETE shortcuts
Windows path name handling bug fixes
More path handling code bug fixes; updated docs to mention shortcut change
UNC paths should now work on Windows

This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
'jedit-4-0-pre7'.
replace all beanshell bug fix; some beanshell api refactoring
fixed middle mouse button drag bug
trying to fix numeric keypad problems
undo: fixed merging of remove operations
gnu.regexp 1.1.5 snapshot from GNU savannah CVS
install plugins layout bug fix; key event workaround hack
Andre's hex mode, tweak to 'quick hypersearch' command
Added IBM informix 4GL syntax highlighting (Vicente Salvador)
fixed compile error; fixed BeanShell replace bug
fixed obscure caret event firing bug
new jEditLauncher from John; pre8 almost ready

This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
'jedit-4-0-pre8'.
fixed QuickNotepad's build.xml; plugin list is now gzipped
minor tweak to docking border code
fixed stylesheet bug, updated wheel mouse tip
show now show network drive mappings, etc in roots: filesystem
some more bug fixes -- 4.0pre9 ready to go

This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
'jedit-4-0-pre9'.
for OS X: don't show hidden files in macros menu
fixed minor bug in text area's control-click behavior

This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
'jedit-4-0-final'.
fix for vfs file chooser dialog bug
SOCKS proxy; minor vfs browser tweak
Printing code updates from Thomas Dilts
cleaned up EB messages a little
status bar new look; minor dockable UI tweaks
more little changes here and there
added copyright notices to tom's code
sasha's auto indent patch; misc other crap
auto indent bug fix from sasha-m; removed MultiSelectStatusChanged message; status bar shows messages when properties changed
fixed parseFully with text files slowdown...
digits regexp added to syntax highlighting, print preview removed (sorry tom)
possible fix for help viewer appearing behind the view
digit highlighting code overhauled; fix for status bar bold font issue
new splash and maybe other stuff
More syntax and text area reworking
More token marker refactoring, about box has a new look
made some changes to the ParserRule class
more syntax refactoring and bug fixes
SEQs no longer needed for keyword separators (see change log for details)
simpler about box, status bar fix
display optimizations; background token painting fixed; code cleanups
moved syntax line display code to org.gjt.sp.jedit.syntax package
HTML and related edit modes now highlight inline javascript and CSS better
added 'settings directory' and 'jEdit home directory' menus to utilities menu
plugin manager did not delete downloaded files
yet another auto indent fix for C-like languages
implemented directory search on non-local filesystems
minor code cleanups in VFS classes
MacOS X roots: filesystem and new tool bar iocns from Kris Kopicki (old icons still remain for a little while)
new help viewer and quicknotepad icons from krisk
fixed MARK_FOLLOWING rule (for real this time...) fixed tab expansion
layout changes; removed old tool bar icons
minor print code cleanups, fixed print tab expansion bug
rollover buttons for L&F's other than metal
fixed dynamic menus on MacOS when the menu bar is at the top of the screen, more soft wrap work
soft wrap should now behave exactly the same as it did in 4.0
perl mode fix, more debug messages
better rectangular selection, vertical paste, re-arranged edit menu
rectangular selections can now extend into virtual space
fixing bugs in new rectangular selection code
monospaced font hack now settable by changing boolean field in ChunkCache.java
line context info was not properly invalidated when switching edit modes
search bar tweak, better splash from krisk

This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
'jedit-4-1-pre1'.
added new icon for XML plugin
directory listing no longer blocks GUI if hypersearch is on
double-click drag behavior toggle patch from Gerd Knops
tooltips toggle from kris kopicki (sans options dialog change)
improved popup menu positioning code; broken image icon shown for tool bar buttons whose icons cannot be loaded
fixed resize problem with views and L&F decorated frames
fixed similar problem with floating dockables
startup script code now uses macro handlers to support languages other than beanshell
all dockable windows now have a -float action
modified C-like modes to use AT_WHITESPACE_END instead of AT_LINE_START for labels
patch from gerd, integer property methods trim whitespace'
possible bsh performance improvement, various other tweaks
encoding menu in file system browser

This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
'jedit-4-1-pre2'.
starting pre3; first commit in ages
A new edit mode, minor abbrev tweak
A few minor changes to global options dialog box
some changes to buffer property code
2 new icons from kris, manifest support from marco
fix for file system browser switching buffers for no reason when reload a directory
added option for jEdit 4.0-style tool bar layout
added easy way to open new floating instances of dockables
Starting some more global options dialog box tweaking
new tool bar icons and a mode loader bug fix
moved color settings from colors option pane to text area and gutter panes, let me know if you like the new layout
added some actions for working with dockable windows
a few new icons, browser auto complete works 99% of the time now
right-clicks now supported in parent directories list
some minor tweaks and documentation updates
started work on SEQ_REGEXP/SPAN_REGEXP/EOL_SPAN_REGEXP syntax rules
updated AWK and COBOL edit modes
more work on regexp syntax rules

This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

AppleScript mode, updated Informix mode, icon updates
i don't like the new window icon
added mode catalog entry for applescript mode
Edit button in tool bar option pane, some bug fixing
unsplit-current action; bug fix for actions creating dockables
split next/prev word commands into old and -std forms; this replaces the stdNextPrevWord property
tip of the day typo fix; updated perl.xml
fixed close current docking area; parseFully option always on now
krisk bug fix for MacOS plugin
rudimentary help search feature now works
a few minor changes to kick off 4.1pre6
Revised to fix bug arising in jEdit 4.1pre5 - built-in variables lose global visibility in listener method
replaced indentOnTab setting with insert-tab and insert-tab-indent actions
DIGIT_RE fix; new MacOS plugin from kris
updated fortran mode, minor UI fix
new splash from krisk, multiple hypersearch patch from peter cox
trying to fix search bar focus problem
OS X bug fix, minor Macros.Handler behavior tweak
help search works sort of, bug fixes
searchable help now works pretty well
2 new edit modes; fixed bsh namespace bug
new icons from krisk, other stuff

This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag

backed out rw lock fix, added freemaker syntax highlighting
trying to fix some obscure search and replace bugs
window maximization state is now remembered
OS X fsb right click fix
adding and removing a few files
soft wrap and non-wrap uses the same display update code; soft wrap scrolling smoother
redcode syntax highlighting from Will Varfar
more updates to freemaker syntax highlighting, documentation updates
error list dialogs show errors in activity log; updated shellscript.xml
minor bug fixes, some doc updates
cleaned up auto indent code; now works better with Python and Lisp
endless minor bug fixes and documentation updates

This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
'jedit-4-1-pre8'.
removing unused local variables and imports (Xavier Le Vourch)
more mouse button workarounds for OS X (krisk)

text area buffer change handler fix
editing pane fix, global options saves geometry
trying to fix IBM JDK 1.4 problem
installer now installs a man page

undo bug fix, one touch expanding re-added
fixed showstopper bug with splitting code

This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
'jedit-4-1-pre9'.
macro guide updates, javadoc updates, fixed undo bug, fixed narrow bug
fixed default.abbrevs, fixed installer on OS/2
macro guide updates; added doclet for generatic toc.xml from javadoc
saving divider position in options dialog
search and replace message dialog boxes are now parented by the search dialog not the view
bug fix; FAQ updates from krisk
removed API guide part of user's guide in favor of new javadocs
using apache bzip2 instead of BSD-licensed bzip2 now; installer code placed in the public domain
forgot to add bzip2 and tar libraries

This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
'jedit-4-1-pre10'.
VariableGridLayout now public domain with Dirk's permission; so all installer code is public domain now
added an api needed by sidekick
views are now opened a bit quicker
spell-checked docs, commented out some debug code in jEdit.java
added xml.root buffer-local property to user's guide source files
buffer.getDirectory() method added; IntegerArray default size increased
fixed FileVFS._mkdirs() with more than one dir being created
deprecated LineElement class (it should not be used anyway)
fix for bug reported by anti
Mac OS Plugin 2.0.3; Fixed issues with background mode
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'macos-2_0_3'.
narrowing bug fix, jEdit.exit() fix from krisk
minor quick copy drag usability issue w/ block caret

This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
'jedit-4-1-pre11'.

This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'macos-2_0_4'.
vfs browser bug fix in progress; updated icons from krisk; updated a macro
removed commented out crap from text.xml'
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'jedit-4-1'.
content manager no longer allocates unused 1024 char array
endOffsets optimization minimizes unnecessary memory allocation when loading many files
started new activity log, removed some dead code from Buffer class
log viewer not so offensive now; merged soft wrap and non-soft wrap redisplay
added missing option for multiple selection color
more docking work, a file system browser bug fix
BeanShell wm built-in variable, docking bug fixes
change buffer property locking semantics; fix redo not resetting dirty status
moved chunk merge from repaint stage to cache stage; scrolling should be faster with smooth text on
monospaced hack automatically enabled with monospaced fonts, faster long line display
AT_* flags now independent for SPAN::BEGIN/END, background color token improvements
SPAN::END group substitution, updated perl, php, shellscript syntax highlighting
persistent splits, different colors for different fold levels, a new default color scheme
a few bug fixes, some new token types
Started eliminating use of xToOffset/offsetToX from the text area; started refactoring chunk cache
alt-click in gutter narrows to fold
first import of krisk's plugin manager
misc tweaks, plugin manager work, starting new redisplay
added DisplayManager class to eventually replace FoldVisibilityManager
DirectoryListSet tweaks, all actions now added to action bar history
display manager now counts lines correctly; starting moving away from FoldVisibilityManager
fixed array out of boudns problems when resizing
chunk cache scroll optimization re-enabled, bug fixes
display manager bug fixes, jEdit.getAction() a bit faster
buffer.mode= in action bar now works
more display work and bug fixes
more display bug fixes, changed symlink handling
added Debug class with various debugging flags
added status indicator for rectangular selection
menu bar tweaks, more display work
more display bug fixes and cleanups
expandFolds works again, offset manager optimizations
fixed a few problems, removed unneeded debug messages
added -newview, -newplainview, -reuseview command line switches -- they work in the client only
better invalidation for slightly faster chunk cache operations
first line could lose sync with display when folds are collapsed
better handling of files being changed on disk
path handling cleanup, fixed files changed dialog npe
files changed dialog should work now
started refactoring for deferred plugin load API
added a mail mode, handy if you use jEdit as a mail composition editor
started better completion in file system browser
bug fixes and starting better completion in file system browser
better completion in file system browser dialog boxes; bug fixes
started details view in file system browser
renamed VFSDirectoryEntryCellRenderer to FileCellRenderer for backward compatibility
file system browser detail view almost done
extended attributes API and more details view work
simpler offset manager no longer uses 64-bit arithmetic
installer now supports VMS, array index out of bounds fix for untitled files
much better up/down/left/right with rectangular selection, changed text area rect select behavior
more refactoring for new plugin API
added services api which is only used for fold handlers at the present
refactored EditPlugin.JAR and portions of JARClassLoader into new PluginJAR class; many code cleanups in plugin loader
deferred loading works for LatestVersion plugin
add backwards compatibility EditPlugin.JAR class to avoid breaking plugins
fixed incorrect roots vfs service entry; fixed tree table scrolling; added NO_ESCAPE attribute to SPAN and SPAN_REGEXP rules
fixed infinite loop with invalid vfs color pattern; fix rectangular selection exception
browser actions API. provide a browser.actions.xml file in your plugin's JAR; reference the 'browser' variable in the CODE blocks of the actions
added api for plugin menu items in browser to replace VFS.BROWSE_CAP. Define plugin.XXX.browser-menu-item or plugin.XXX.browser-menu properties listing browser action names
fixed plugin manager null pointer exception
new option pane api for deferred plugins; updated quicknotepad for 4.2 api; various fixes
property cache -- if you used previous commit, remoev all your jars-cache files
updated javadocs for jEdit 4.2 plugin API
ditched selective property cache, too kludgy
some DockableWindowManager changes to support plugin dynamic load/unload; file dialog debugging
fixed news42.xml. my name is Slava Pestov not Slava Slava

update about dialog box name list

Changed all calls to new HelpViewer() to HelpViewer.create()
so that we can change the helpviewer class that is created.

This is in preparation for making it possible to extend the HelpViewer
by creating other kinds of classes that can view help.

Turned HelpViewer into a component which is more plugin-able.
Now the HelpViewer is created through a HelpViewerFactory,
whose behavior can be customized by the InfoViewer or other plugins.

leading underscores are discouraged from user defined macros.

committing unworking changes.

From: Bertalan Fodor <fodber@freemail.hu>
Date: Sun, 01 Jan 2006 19:36:13 +0100

I desperately need this fix in JARClassLoader. The problem is that jEdit
doesn't store package information in loaded classes, so getPackage()
returns null in classes loaded from JARs. That makes impossible to
include certain libraries.

Try this macro:

c = console.Console.class;
Macros.message(view, c.getPackage().toString());

Anyway, the problem arose from trying to embed multivalent
(multivalent.sf.net), which uses getPackage for some sophisticated
resource loading mechanism.

Bert

Fix SF Bug #1527824: Perl Syntax Highlighting hangs 4.3pre6.
See details in the CHANGES.txt file. Basically, the regexp was trying to match things it shouldn't, causing (i) a "hang" in some cases (actually a very, very, very long pause with the CPU pegged at 100%) and (ii) incorrect highlighting in some cases.

Fix SF Bug #1541009:
"$" matches right before the end of line; so we need to adjust the end of the matched region when that is used. Also, don't search in empty strings.

Better fix for bug #1541009: add a method that tells whether the matched region ends at an EOL; the callers of SearchMatcher.nextMatch() should use that information to adjust the offset for the next search. This fixes the bug and maintains the expected behavior when doing a replace.
- fix search wrap when searching for the '$' regexp (which I broke with my last change).

Splash Screen is now actually in the middle of my screen, instead of split across my two displays.

- make VFSBrowser use a filter class instead of just a glob filter string; implement a filter that uses globs to maintain the old functionality
- move MiscUtilities.globToRE() to StandardUtilities.
- add PropertiesBean class (look at javadoc for details).

- fix bug #1543889: "Return value for Beanshell snippet" problem
BeanShell was not properly overwriting new methods added with the same signature of old method. 

There were two side-effects of this:

 (i) the first method with a particular name and signature would always be used, forever, even if a new method with the same signature was added. This broke the way the SearchAndReplace class cached the BS snippet used to do the substitution.

(ii) Since the method was still "compiled" and added to the internal list, there would be a slow memory leak.

Fix is to properly compare the signature of the new method with any old method registered with the same name, and get rid of the old method if it matches.

Fixed 1527419: Setting or deleting markers should not dirty buffer. Handling of the markers file is now factored out to MarkersSaveRequest.java.

fixed infinite loops in transliteration and regex highlighting, added complex operators, perl special variables, references, dereferencing expressions, implicit literals (in hash expressions), labels, file globs
Suggest some more verbosity if Debug.DUMP_KEY_EVENTS==true
Some more radical changes in case of Debug.SIMPLIFIED_KEY_HANDLING==true . Maybe this fixes bug 1542026.
Some more refactoring: removing code duplication.
Radical changes lead to regressions until a new optimimum is reached.
Some infrastructure to disambiguate global key events from local key events
Disambiguate global key events from local key events
Some more radical keyboard handling changes...
reorganized the saving of markers, reducing the use of WorkThreads when saving markers and when deleting left-over markers files

Sf.net # 1562839 - added the previous overloaded form of handleKeyStroke
for backward compatibility with plugins...
See patch #1555403 - applied the second and third patches submitted there.

It's time to drop the "pre" in the version. Let's just call
it 4.3.07.
some java 1.5 api used (and a HashTable replaced by HashMap, hope synchronization will not fail)
bug 1565286 fixed (and some similar too with browse action)
buffer io requests moved from package buffer to bufferio
1565277 - FSB now expands varaibles in the file field.
Removed a little console remnant here...
Oops. we actually need this in windows...
Moved the doc comments to the right place..
the TextAreaTransferHandler is now specific for jEdit and another one will replace it for independant text area
Upping the version to 4.3final. It's about time!
AntiAlias is now independant from jEdit and EditPane.CaretInfo use int instead of Integer
introduced Options class that can contains options needed by jEdit. And removed the SIMPLIFIED_KEY_HANDLING field from Debug class
Added column sorting for VFS browser
the input events should not be forwarded to the View but to it's InputHandler. The keyboard handling methods that were in View are moved to InputHandler
introduced MouseActionsProvider interface that can overload the mouse actions event
the options are now loaded in jEdit and not from the Options class directly
a lot of changes for independant textarea
Ok, it's not final yet. Pre7 is release candidate 1.
VFS Broswer: Added icons to indicate the sorted column and the sorting direction
VFS browser: keep current sort parameters throughout session; bug fix in FileVFS
upped the memory, added some nicer options...
the HistoryModel is now independant from jEdit
method processKeyEventKeyStrokeHandling() moved to AbstractInputHandler, dependency to view completely removed from TextArea

- Fix SF Bug #1574562: 4.3pre7 regex find/replace fails
  When adjusting the offset after an EOL match, need to check whether
  the new value is larger than the end of the search region and break
  the loop.

Fix the PrintStream implementation used as stdout/stderr to properly handle the new printf() method in Java 5; printf will call "write()" on the underlying output stream several times for the same message, which would case jEdit to break down a single-line message into lots of small messages, making them unreadable.

Also, "just in case", make the output stream synchronized.

- in build.xml, allow overriding whether deprecation is on or off from the build.properties file.
(Argh!) Actually synchronize the print stream/ output stream on the same object so that threads writing to stdout/stderr don't race each other.
VFS browser: sort columns by extension when clicking on column "Type"
